summary: Did you ever wondered that the guards have coloured armors and shields, but no suited daggers? Well, now they have!
descriptionHtml:
Did you ever wondered that the guards e.g. in Whiterun DO have coloured armors and shields, but DON\'T have suited weapons; daggers or something like that?!

So what does this mod?
 This mod adds these daggers!
The Mod adds:
The daggers are balanced and they just look great. Every Guard, which is a guard from a hold, gets the suited dagger with the suited colours and logos.
 Finally, there is a reason to use the steel daggers, which are not used anymore in the vanilla-game. 

I\'m Not updating this file anymore!

I will be pleased if you add more Screenshots!
That is just my fifth mod now, so be kindly!
If you want an equal to this mod just with BOWs, then look here: :http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34409
If you want an equal to this mod just with SWORDS, then look here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34382
IF YOU WANT A COMPILATION OF ALL MY 3 GUARD WEAPONS MODS, then look here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34470
installation: copy all files into the skyrim/data direction

Please Endorse, if you like it!
author: GGinddi
